zh.product_intro_detail_one_title: 数字货币 抵押贷款

zh.product_intro_detail_one_value_two: 牛市增加资金杠杆，提高资金周转效率
zh.product_intro_detail_two_title: 多种托管方式，安全可信赖
zh.product_intro_detail_three_title: 无准入门槛，贷款计划可定制

zh.product_intro_detail_three_value_two: 联系客服定制专属贷款计划
zh.product_intro_detail_four_value_two: 支持多种数字货币抵押贷款

en.product_intro_detail_two_value_two: Licensed custody with connection to LedgerX
